article_title: School Board take oath of office, take variety of actions
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: RIPLEY - The Jackson County Board of Education took a variety of actions at their regular meeting on the evening of June 26.Judge Thomas C. Evans III, chief judge of the Fifth Judicial Circuit, administered the oath of office to recently-reelected board members, Steve Wedge, Jack Wiseman and Carroll Staats.Cinda Francis of the Sandyville Community Pride Committee provided the board with an update on the Gilmore Elementary School walking trail.The board approved BrickStreet Insurance as a
